docna.cdata!:
Somali - Second Agricultural Sector
            Adjustment Program : Credit 2030 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Somali - Second Agricultural

repnme.cdata!:
Somalia - Second Agricultural Sector
            Adjustment Program Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The program will finance recurrent
            import requirements of the Somali economy in support of
            significant policy reforms. The reforms include the
            continuation of reform in the foreign exchange policies, the
            decontrol of the financing system, the elimination of
            subsidies in diesel fuel and tractor rentals, the
            liberalization of agricultural marketing, the improvement of
            the land tenure institutions, and the expansion of private
            sector participation in supplying and distributing inputs
            and services to the economy. The program will also provide
            technical assistance for strengthening key government
            institutions, mainly in agriculture.
